title: honor system
body: i read that after getting lvl 3 Honor we'd get honor capsules instead of just key fragments.. i did receive 2 capsules right when i got lvl 3 but now i am lvl 4  i havent had anymore drop only single key fragments less often...(still getting honors every game) so im wondering if this may be an error or if riot did away with the capsules already maybe?

replies.body:
Im at lvl 4

haven't received anything except key fragments

I maybe you need to be climbing the honor latter at the same rate as before, and there could possible be an error with the increased amount of honor for next level, so expecting you to somehow ramp up the rate you gain honor.  

One way that used to work was the honorable opponent feature, oh well rest in peace.
I've been honor 3 for about 2 weeks now and have yet to receive a capsule. Meh. I'm sure I'll get one eventually.
thanks yall! i was just wondering because after lvl 3 i was getting 2-4 key frags dropping at once now at lvl 4 im getting 1 a week if im lucky just seems like a big difference to me..
i've only gotten one capsual at lvl3 and i felt they made it sound like in addition to key drops

My friend got a capsule almost right after getting honor 3 a few weeks ago, so I'd say they're still in the game.

Don't worry though. I haven't gotten a single capsule and I'm honor 4. All I've gotten are key fragments.
Although the rewards are distributed randomly, I'm pretty sure theres an upper limit that you can earn each month.
